name: SEPA XML Generator
description: Generates SEPA XML files for credit transfer (SCT) or direct debits (SDD). You can also validate IBANs and generate mandates in PDF format.

api_methods.name: validate-iban
api_methods.description: Validates a set of IBANs. If valid, adds information about the bank that issued it, like BIC, bank name or country code.

utterances.utterance: Can you check if this IBAN is valid?
I need to verify the validity of an IBAN number.
Please confirm if this IBAN is correct.
Is this IBAN valid and which bank issued it?
Can you validate this IBAN and provide the bank details?
I want to know if this IBAN is legitimate.
Could you verify the authenticity of this IBAN?
Check if this IBAN is valid and tell me the country code.
Please validate this IBAN and let me know the BIC code.
Is this IBAN valid and can you provide the bank name?

api_methods.name: generate-sepa-sdd-file
api_methods.description: Generates an SEPA XML file with direct debits.

utterances.utterance: Create an SEPA XML file for direct debits.
I need to generate a direct debit SEPA XML file.
Can you produce an SEPA XML for my direct debits?
Generate a direct debit file in SEPA XML format.
Please create a SEPA XML file for my direct debit transactions.

Could you help me with generating a SEPA XML for direct debits?
Make a SEPA XML file for my direct debit payments.
I need an SEPA XML file for direct debit purposes.
Can you generate a SEPA XML file for my direct debits?
